editor.align-left-title: Align two or more components to the left relative to their parent
editor.align-center-title: Vertically center two or more components relative to their parent
editor.align-right-title: Align two or more components to the right relative to their parent
editor.align-top-title: Align two or more components to the top relative to their parent

editor.align-bottom-title: Align two or more components to the bottom relative to their parent
editor.stroke-width-title: Change Outline width by 1, shift-click to change by 0.1
editor.tools-clone-title: Copy, to make a copy of the selected component [D]
editor.tools-delete-title: Trash, to delete the selected component [Delete/Backspace]
editor.tools-movebottom-title: Send to back, move the selected component to the very bottom layer if there are component overlapping each other [ Ctrl+Shift+[ ]
editor.tools-movetop-title: Bring to front, move the selected component to the very top layer if there are component overlapping each other [ Ctrl+Shift+] ]
editor.tools-deletemulti-title: Trash, to delete the selected component [Delete/Backspace]
editor.tools-alignleft-title: Align the left edge of a group of components
editor.tools-alignright-title: Align the right edge of a group of components
editor.tools-aligntop-title: Align the top edge of a group of components
editor.tools-alignmiddle-title: Align two or more components to the centerpoints
editor.tools-alignbottom-title: Align the bottom edge of a group of components
editor.tools-dividevertical-title: Align two or more components in a stack (Padding between components)
editor.tools-dividehorizontal-title: Align two or more components in a row (Padding between components)
editor.tools-palettecolor-title: Click to change fill color, shift-click to change outline color
